title: Bombers Burrito Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mexican food and bar. Accommodating to special request and tries to ensure vegan orders do not cross-contaminated with cheese/meats. Has burrito and tacos with BBQ tofu, veggie chicken nuggets, tofu fries, beans and rice, veggie chili.
